description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fn9ue","text":"Immunocytochemistry for morphology analysis. Staining of cell culture in order to obtain fluorescence images of the culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_affiliation: School of Physics and Astronomy, Tel-Aviv University, Tel-Aviv, Israel

collections.protocol_name: Protocols for activity changes in Neuron-Astrocyte Networks in Culture Under the Effect of Norepinephrine
collections.protocol_name_html: Protocols for activity changes in Neuron-Astrocyte Networks in Culture Under the Effect of Norepinephrine

authors_list.name: Yasmin Bar El
authors_list.affiliation: School of Physics and Astronomy, Tel-Aviv University, Tel-Aviv, Israel

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"bq65e","text":"1. Wash the culture twice in a phosphate buffered saline (PBS);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6g3ps","text":"2. Fix with 4% paraformaldehyde (Merck) for 10 min , then put it in PBS until staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":50,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"ftfvn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"EA32DB40BB1C11E88AEA39B7F6F66648","duration":600,"label":"","step_guid":"6B4A10C0BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73"}}],"guid":"6B4A10C0BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","id":665176,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":" Cell fix"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnvmj","text":"Wash fixed cultures three times with PBS (10 min  each).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":48,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"36ede","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"C6214E30BB1C11E88AEA39B7F6F66648","duration":600,"label":"","step_guid":"7FE618D0BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73"}}],"guid":"7FE618D0BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","id":665177,"previous_id":665176,"previous_guid":"6B4A10C0BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","section":" Staining"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e538f","text":"Permeabilize with 0.5% triton X-100 (Sigma-Aldrich) in PBS for 10 min .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":69,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"3dkpv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"CCE861E0BB1C11E88AEA39B7F6F66648","duration":600,"label":"","step_guid":"8DAF2650BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73"}}],"guid":"8DAF2650BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","id":665178,"previous_id":665177,"previous_guid":"7FE618D0BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","section":"Permeabilization"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"22gg8","text":"Block with 2% BSA, 10% normal donkey serum, and 0.25% triton X-100 solution in PBS for 1 h  at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":90,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"4lpk1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"D69D1FA0BB1C11E88AEA39B7F6F66648","duration":3600,"label":"","step_guid":"9A4DBD90BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73"}}],"guid":"9A4DBD90BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","id":665179,"previous_id":665178,"previous_guid":"8DAF2650BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","section":"Block"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4p22g","text":"Incubate overnight with rabbit anti-GFAP (1:400, Sigma-Aldrich, cat# G9269, RRID: AB_477035), mouse anti-NeuN (1:200, Millipore, cat# MAB377, RRID: AB_2298772) at 4 \u00b0C .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":167,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"ekh5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"E2069240BB1C11E88AEA39B7F6F66648","temperature":"4","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"A9286220BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73"}}],"guid":"A9286220BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","id":665180,"previous_id":665179,"previous_guid":"9A4DBD90BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","section":"Primary antibody incubation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ll2m","text":"Wash three times with PBS and incubated for 1 h  at room temperature with the appropriate secondary antibodies: Alexa fluor 488 goat anti-rabbit IgG (1:400, Jackson Laboratories) for the detection of GFAP and Cy-3 donkey anti-mouse IgG (1:700, Jackson Laboratories) for NeuN.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":47,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"836hi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"F3205160BB1C11E88AEA39B7F6F66648","duration":3600,"label":"","step_guid":"B6C41E10BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73"}}],"guid":"B6C41E10BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","id":665181,"previous_id":665180,"previous_guid":"A9286220BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","section":"Secondary antibody incubation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"femct","text":"Mount with aqueous medium containing DAPI (VECTASHIELD Mounting Medium with DAPI, Vector Laboratories, H-1200).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"C4D53110BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","id":665182,"previous_id":665181,"previous_guid":"B6C41E10BB1A11E888ECA5815BB7BA73","section":"DAPI stain"}
